---MOQ112686195777a42f802b11d2fb7d7fa6449fc497ae
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

I try to find a method to filter the crawl.log file in order to detect streaming
media files. There is an interesting parameter using Heritrix's status-code.
Indeed code 0 always provides a streaming protocol URL (rstp://, mms://), see
attachment. As code -7 which mostly provides file:// mailto:// URLs.

I wonder which is the difference between these two status-code 0 and -7.
As one can see in the user manual:
 0 Fetch never tried (perhaps protocol unsupported or illegal URI)
-7 URI recognized as unsupported or illegal

Thanks,

Nico
